post_title: FS T206 Vic Willis Piedmont 42 crispy PSA 2.5 (SOLD!)
post_content:
Hey all,

Looking to sell my Piedmont Factory 42 Vic Willis Trowing. Super sharp, just one bad corner, that couple probably be flattened out, but I never get things graded, so not worth my time.

$$$old takes him home. Pricing net to me. PM to take it.

Thanks,
Bob
